content:
Netizen contribution
Although a considerable number of Chinese netizens are now gloating over the earthquake in Turkey and Syria, the fact is that the Turkish earthquake is sounding the alarm for us.
According to a related paper from the Institute of Geophysics of the China Earthquake Administration, once the annual earthquake energy release ratio in the Eurasian seismic belt is higher than 50% and is accompanied by earthquakes of magnitude 8 or above, there is a possibility of a magnitude 7-8 earthquake in mainland China within the next three years.

content:
Netizen contribution
Today, a primary school in Wuhan held an online parent meeting on short notice, asking parents to educate their elderly family members about the medical insurance reform. If they have any opinions, they should submit them in written form to the teachers, who will then pass them on to their leaders.

Netizen contribution
A high school in Guangxi announced that it would launch a comprehensive practice activity, allowing students to bring pets to school, with a limit of one pet per class. It hopes to cultivate students' love, sense of responsibility and humanistic empathy.
